title.text: Security Update for Exchange Server 2003 Service Pack 2 (KB976702) - Non-cluster

description.text: This Update is for non-clustered Exchange servers. A security issue has been identified that could allow a Denial of Service Attack against your Microsoft Exchange Server 2003 Service Pack 2 systems. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
